webTest.description: Test species page rewrite rule with no taxon provided

webTest.name: Test species page rewrite 2
webTest.description: Test species page rewrite rule with no taxon provided (trailing slash)

webTest.name: Test species page rewrite 3
webTest.description: Test species page rewrite rule with taxon provided

webTest.name: Instances XML URL forwarding test
webTest.description: Tests that requests to the instances XML document are forwarded to the services machine

webTest.name: Client versions XML URL forwarding test
webTest.description: Tests that requests to the client versions XML document are forwarded to the services machine
